definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)
medium/intermediary/matchmaker/go-between/abbr. for 媒體|媒体[mei2 ti3], media, esp. news media

sentences.english: A key characteristic of a bus is that it is a shared transmission medium.
sentences.chinese: 總線的關鍵特性是共享傳輸媒體。

sentences.english: A condition that results from concurrent transmissions on the transmission medium.
sentences.chinese: 在傳輸媒體上由併發傳輸造成的一種狀況。

sentences.english: In a token-bus network, a signal indicating that the transmission medium is inactive.
sentences.chinese: 在權標總線網中，一種指明傳輸媒體非現用的信號。
